channel.title: GreatXscape 24/7 ||Brand New Server || Dedicated Coders
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i59.tinypic.com/2zfvdwx.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]website -[url=http://greatxscape.org/]http://greatxscape.org/[/url][/center] Launcher- https://www.dropbox.com/s/ef2jzjsfby5eg8c/GreatXscape.jar?dl=1&j=1 Donloadable client - https://www.dropbox.com/s/uhqmlgqpstwo5w3/GreatXScape-Client.jar?dl=1 Webclient - http://www.greatxscape.org/webclient/
The maker of SupremeScape is back with another server! In colaboration with the owner of GreatXScape we are once again striving for a fun and enjoyable server. Don't think we haven't do anything in the meanwhile, we have been doing nothing else than developing this server. Come take a look and take a trip back into time. Let the nostalgia begin!
Features: - 24/7 VPS hosted - 15 Custom Boss - Vote Boss - All other bosses we all know are availible - Custom Home - Custom Torva - Boss Box - 25/25 Skills working - Prestige system up to 10 prestiges - Hans gives veteran capes based on your online time - 5 Quests - All the Matrix minigames and 3 others made by me - Use the sawmill to make planks and use these to create the nicest furniture - Dungeoneering where you can choose what you want to kill (Har'lakk the Riftsplitter or his minions) - Loyalty Points & Pk Points - The Abyss 100% like RS - Full Living Rock Caverns - Clue Scrolls - Over 20 NPC caves - Refurbished donator features - Donator Dung - Donator Dragons - Weekly events - Level up shops - Pvm points system - Runespan - Drygores mainhand/offhand more pictures [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LuAW2Ue.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TuLRqA3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TCQCJhY.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TrsQjcT.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MJ4dKRI.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NYSFDMG.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XwElbaR.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3H6qtQJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RUX0CtP.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SAC8DNM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HkZI1il.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XqDToux.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NyU9Xwl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VoZgZCQ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/N6sd2my.png[/img] And much more to discover in the world of GreatXScape
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4oS1kCt.gif[/img]

item.title: GreatXscape 24/7 ||Brand New Server || Dedicated Coders
item.dc:creator: @kbpapango kbpapango
item.description:
@kbpapango wrote:

[center][/center]

[center]website -http://greatxscape.org/[/center]
Launcher- https://www.dropbox.com/s/ef2jzjsfby5eg8c/GreatXscape.jar?dl=1&j=1
Donloadable client - https://www.dropbox.com/s/uhqmlgqpstwo5w3/GreatXScape-Client.jar?dl=1
Webclient - http://www.greatxscape.org/webclient/

The maker of SupremeScape is back with another server! In colaboration with the owner of GreatXScape we are once again striving for a fun and enjoyable server. Don’t think we haven’t do anything in the meanwhile, we have been doing nothing else than developing this server. Come take a look and take a trip back into time. Let the nostalgia begin!

Features:

  • 24/7 VPS hosted
  • 15 Custom Boss
  • Vote Boss
  • All other bosses we all know are availible
  • Custom Home
  • Custom Torva
  • Boss Box
  • 25/25 Skills working
  • Prestige system up to 10 prestiges
  • Hans gives veteran capes based on your online time
  • 5 Quests
  • All the Matrix minigames and 3 others made by me
  • Use the sawmill to make planks and use these to create the nicest furniture
  • Dungeoneering where you can choose what you want to kill (Har’lakk the Riftsplitter or his minions)
  • Loyalty Points & Pk Points
  • The Abyss 100% like RS
  • Full Living Rock Caverns
  • Clue Scrolls
  • Over 20 NPC caves
  • Refurbished donator features
  • Donator Dung
  • Donator Dragons
  • Weekly events
  • Level up shops
  • Pvm points system
  • Runespan
  • Drygores mainhand/offhand
    more pictures















    And much more to discover in the world of GreatXScape

Read full topic
